paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Subject with the mutant form had a worse long-term prognosis than the wild-type form.
Despite being a carrier, this individual did not show any symptoms at the time of evaluation.

functional_data.summary: The variant leads to destabilization of the TTR tetramer, promoting amyloidogenesis.
assays: functional assays measuring amyloid fibril formation

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with a significant clinical phenotype.
key_quotes: The instability that leads to the dissociation of native TTR can be secondary to pathogenic mutations in the TTR gene.
Subjects with the mutant form had a worse long-term prognosis than the wild-type form.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text, focusing on the TTR gene.
